name: TP Restoration
description:
Game made for #ZostanWDomuRobGry (#StayHomeAndCreateGames) jam.

It's year 20xx...
A pandemic engulfed Earth 30 years ago, leading to the rise of the New World Order. 
There is one thing behind all of this: toilet paper. It suddenly disappeared everywhere, becoming a legend, a myth.
The prophecy foretold that the one who will manage to find three rolls of it...
... will restore the peace once and for all.

CONTROLS: 

  • Z to interact with things (A on mobile)
  • WASD/arrow keys to move
  • Enter to see your inventory (Start on mobile)

CREATORS:

  • Polydeuces - lead 2D artist, level designer, lead story designer
  • Yeas - composer, story designer
  • Ufokhi - programmer, story designer
  • Yvraine - character designer, proofreader, QA

The game is a bit loud, so make sure to LOWER YOUR VOLUME before playing!
